repos_data.description: Node.js/TypeScript MCP server for Atlassian Jira. Equips AI systems (LLMs) with tools to list/get projects, search/get issues (using JQL/ID), and view dev info (commits, PRs). Connects AI capabilities directly into Jira project management and issue tracking workflows.

Node.js/TypeScript MCP server for Atlassian Confluence. Provides tools enabling AI systems (LLMs) to list/get spaces & pages (content formatted as Markdown) and search via CQL. Connects AI seamlessly to Confluence knowledge bases using the standard MCP interface.
